name: Hungry Games
description:
Hungry Games is a Game where you must compete in Minigames created by some animals so you can get FREE FOOD

it was supposed to be a big map okay :(

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move around

SHIFT to sprint

E or SPACEBAR to interact

LEFT CLICK for playing some minigames, and select yes or no

Credit:

Big shoutout to Life in Quarantine for letting me use their assets!

Thank you Hobodobo for making the characters art and 1 of the music tracks!
